property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Memory Unit]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three heads. One big headache.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1 [Credits] for each advancement token on that ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Edge of World is installed and you pay 3 [Credits] when the Runner accesses it, do 1 brain damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez a piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." - Andromeda

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may gain [Click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, take 1 [Credits] from Marked Accounts, if able. [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Marked Accounts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the first meat damage each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light and form fitting, its like bulletproof skin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Nerve Agent. Each virus counter after the first on Nerve Agent allows you to access 1 additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost. 1 [Credits]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Advertisement

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Pop-up Window, you gain 1 [Credits]. [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." - Chaos Theory

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [On ICE Encounter] Gain 1 Credits||[Subroutine] Runner pays 1 credit||[Subroutine] End the Run

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 14 [Credits] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it. [Click]: Take 2 [Credits] from Private Contracts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Project Vitruvius, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." - Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." - Andromeda

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." - Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your stack or heap for a program. Install that program, ignoring all costs. Shuffle your stack if you searched it. When this turn ends, add the program to the top of your stack if it is still installed.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Search your stack for a program. Install that program, ignoring all costs and shuffle your stack|-|Search your heap for a program. Install that program, ignoring all costs.]

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Tracer

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, the Runner loses [Click], if able. [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dont Tread On Me

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 3. If successful, runner loses 1 [Click].||[Subroutine] Trace 3. If successful, end the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[Subroutine] Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chop chop

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium
